awd_titl_txt: Aspen Winter Astrophysics Conference, January 3-9, 1987     Aspen, Colorado
awd_abstract_narration: This award partially supports the attendance of young scientists                at a six-day workshop on "The Physics of Supernovae", a part of                 the Aspen Winter Conferences.                                                                                                                                   The appearance of supernova 1987A gave a major boost to the                     subject of supernovae, but the subject was already developing                   increasingly rapidly before 1987.  This award supports expenses of              younger scientists to attend a six-day workshop on "The Physics of              Supernovae".  This workshop will allow a careful integration of                 the various branches of physics and astrophysics that contribute                to and benefit from the subject of supernovae.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
